recipe.title: Toast with Tomato-Butter and Marjoram
ingredients: 1/2 cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, room temperature
1/2 baguette, sliced on a bias, toasted
instructions: Dice 2 tomatoes (you should have about 1 cup). Heat oil in a large skillet over medium. Add shallot and kosher salt and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 2 minutes. Add diced tomatoes and cook, stirring occasionally, until juices release and liquid reduces, about 10 minutes. Let cool.
Purée butter and tomato mixture in a blender or food processor until smooth. Stir in marjoram.
Slice remaining 2 tomatoes. Spread each toast with tomato-butter, top with a tomato slice, and season with sea salt and pepper.
Do Ahead Tomato-butter can be made and chilled for up to 5 days or frozen for up to 3 months.
